update.description:
Combines the functionality from `add_keybindings` (#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/486) and `select_entities` (#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/515).  These two previously mentioned PRs definitely need to be merged before this one is.

This PR allows the user to select entities as well as hold Ctrl while selecting entities to select more than one.  This behavior also transfers to the TransformControl plugin. It's nearly done but has some very specific cases and intricacies.


TODO: 
- select only most recently clicked entity when multiple entities are selected and the transform controller is not in a none state
- Find a way to disable the selection of more entities via the tree view when transform control is already on on
update.title: [WIP] Multiple Select Entities

content.raw: Thanks! I'll push my changes and merge this into pull request #515 so you can have a look.
content.html: Thanks! I'll push my changes and merge this into pull request #515 so you can have a look.

content.raw: @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} I just added the recursive function call for selecting `TreeView` elements.
content.html: @Louise Poubel I just added the recursive function call for selecting TreeView elements.
